positions.JobDescription: ProMoon Software Solution is an innovative tech company leading the way in Software Development and Digital Marketing. We’re in search of passionate Business Development Executives who are driven by the desire to expand our client base and foster long-term relationships. Whether you are a fresher or have some experience, if you have a knack for sales and a deep understanding of the IT industry, we invite you to bring your skills and enthusiasm to our dynamic team.
ResponsibilitiesName: Identify and pursue new business opportunities (Lead Generation) through networking, cold calling, and market research.
Develop and maintain relationships with potential and existing clients, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
Create and deliver compelling presentations and proposals to potential clients.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop strategies that align with business objectives and target audience needs.
Negotiate and close deals, ensuring all terms are aligned with company policies and goals.
Conduct market analysis to identify trends, competitor activities, and potential areas for growth.
Prepare and manage sales reports, forecasts, and budgets.
Stay updated with the latest trends and developments in the IT industry.
Coordinate with internal teams, including software development and digital marketing, to ensure seamless project execution and client satisfaction.
QualificationsAndSkillsName: Proven sales and business development experience, with a strong portfolio of successful deals.
Deep understanding of the IT industry, including software development and digital marketing.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with clients and stakeholders.
Ability to conduct thorough market research and develop effective sales strategies.
Self-motivated and driven, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
Familiarity with CRM software and sales tracking tools.
Should be able to communicate in Fluent English.
WhatWeOfferName: Competitive salary and comprehensive benefits package.
Opportunities for professional growth and skill development.
Exciting and challenging projects in a collaborative work environment.
A friendly and inclusive workplace culture.

positions.JobDescription: We are looking for a passionate and dedicated React JS Developer to join our dynamic team. As a React JS Developer, you will be responsible for building and maintaining web applications with a focus on user experience and performance. This is an excellent opportunity for freshers to kick-start their careers in a collaborative and innovative environment.
ResponsibilitiesName: Develop and maintain web applications using React.js
Create reusable components and front-end libraries
Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility
Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Troubleshoot and debug issues to improve performance
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies
Work closely with the team to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions
WhatWeOfferName: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
Professional development opportunities and continuous learning
A friendly and inclusive work environment
Flexible working hours and a healthy work-life balance
Access to the latest tools and technologies
Opportunity to work on exciting and challenging projects
Health and wellness benefits
Team-building activities and social events
Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals

positions.JobDescription: We are seeking a skilled and motivated Angular JS Developer with 2 years of experience to join our growing team. As an Angular JS Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining dynamic web applications with a focus on creating a seamless user experience. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
ResponsibilitiesName: Develop and maintain web applications using AngularJS
Create reusable components and front-end libraries
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Implement responsive design and ensure cross-browser compatibility
Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate RESTful APIs
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Identify and troubleshoot performance and code issues
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies
RequirementsName: 2 years of experience in AngularJS development
Strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Experience with RESTful services and APIs
Familiarity with front-end build tools such as Grunt or Gulp
Proficiency in using version control systems like Git
Strong attention to detail and ability to work in a team
Good communication skills and a collaborative mindset
WhatWeOfferName: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses
Professional development opportunities and continuous learning
A friendly and inclusive work environment
Flexible working hours and a healthy work-life balance
Access to the latest tools and technologies
Opportunity to work on exciting and challenging projects
Health and wellness benefits
Team-building activities and social events
Mentorship and guidance from experienced professionals
